item.description:
Phil has graciously opened his house to the Rhode Island Atheist Society for dinner and a movie on Friday, November 19th!

We will be viewing the documentary "The God Who Wasn't There". You can learn more about the film at Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.o... or at the website: http://www.thegodmovi...

If you are able to attend please let us know what you can contribute for dinner that evening. Please let me know if you have any questions - hope to see you there!
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society - Movie Night!
